Antenatal Care and Skilled Attendance at Birth by ANMs/LHVs/SNsGUIDELINES
12
Box 2: Estimation of the number of pregnancies annually 
Birth rate = 25/1000 population
Population under the SC = 5000 
Th erefore, expected number of live births = (25 X 5000)/1000
                    = 125 births  
Correction factor      
(pregnancy wastage) = 10% of
